data.introduce: 国际里程(AirFareMileage)服务，主要用于查询行程中每一个航段的里程数。
data.business: 根据航段查询里程信息。
data.functions: 根据航段查询里程信息。
data.requestSchema: qaApiDemos.request:
<TSK_AirfarePrice>
	<Request>
		<UserInfo>
			<UserType>1E</UserType>
			<UserCode>CAN826</UserCode>
			<ChannelId>CRS</ChannelId>
		</UserInfo>
		<SITA_AirfareMileageRQ xmlns="http://www.sita.aero/PTS/fare/2005/12/MileageRQ" xmlns:ota2005a="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" Version="0.001" TicketDate="2005-09-25">
	<POS>
	   <Source>
<RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="Airfare" ID="8Le0x-ee4wR-II49g-MsCDk"/>
</Source>
<Source>
<RequestorID Type="7" ID_Context="CRSCode" ID="1E"/>
</Source>
<Source>
<RequestorID Type="13" ID_Context="IATA_Number" ID="08309560"/>
</Source>
<Source PseudoCityCode="CAN826" AirportCode="CAN"/>
	</POS>
	<Itinerary>
		<OriginDestinationOptions>
			
			<OriginDestinationOption>
				<FlightSegment DepartureDateTime="2014-04-12T09:30:00" RPH="01">
					<DepartureAirport LocationCode="HGH" CodeContext="IATA"/>
					<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="TPE" CodeContext="IATA"/>
					<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
				</FlightSegment>
			</OriginDestinationOption>
			<OriginDestinationOption>
				<FlightSegment DepartureDateTime="2014-04-19T12:20:00" RPH="02">
					<DepartureAirport LocationCode="TPE" CodeContext="IATA"/>
					<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="HGH" CodeContext="IATA"/>
					<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
				</FlightSegment>
			</OriginDestinationOption>
		</OriginDestinationOptions>
	</Itinerary>
	<ItineraryModifiers>
		<ItineraryModifier SegmentRPH="01" TransferIndicator="true"/>
	</ItineraryModifiers>
</SITA_AirfareMileageRQ>
	</Request>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>
qaApiDemos.response:
<TSK_AirfarePrice xmlns="http://www.travelsky.com/fare/xmlInterface">
	<Response>
		<sita:SITA_AirfareMileageRS xmlns:sita="http://www.sita.aero/PTS/fare/2005/12/MileageRS" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ota="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" Version="0.001" TimeStamp="2014-02-18T02:37:18" Target="Test">
			<sita:Success/>
			<sita:MileageInfos>
				<sita:MileageInfo TransferIndicator="true" TicketPointMileage="370" CumulativeTPM="370" MaximumPermittedMileage="444" GlobalIndicator="EH" NextHigherLevelMileage="74" NextLowerLevelMileage="0">
					<sita:DepartureLocation LocationCode="HGH"/>
					<sita:ArrivalLocation LocationCode="TPE"/>
					<sita:Carrier Code="CA"/>
				</sita:MileageInfo>
				<sita:MileageInfo TicketPointMileage="370" CumulativeTPM="740">
					<sita:DepartureLocation LocationCode="TPE"/>
					<sita:ArrivalLocation LocationCode="HGH"/>
					<sita:Carrier Code="CA"/>
				</sita:MileageInfo>
			</sita:MileageInfos>
		</sita:SITA_AirfareMileageRS>
		<Token>8de197a7030f191d66513fb1f46c7ecb</Token>
		<Version>3.8</Version>
	</Response>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>
